name: Node.compareDocumentPosition
description: The Node.compareDocumentPosition() method reports the position of the given node relative to another node in any document — not just the given node’s document.

refs.name: DOM
refs.description: The definition of 'Node.compareDocumentPosition()' in the 'DOM' specification.
